Name: Ricky Recharge
About the game: Charge, Zapp, Dodge, Recharge and Blast your way trough an ever growing army of bots. Try to achieve the highest score while staying alive as long as possible! Synchronise your gun polarity with the robots and score maximum points! Run back and forth to be able to recharge your gun, and use your hard earned coins to upgrade your abilities!
